posts.post_title: WTB :  Joe Jackson card for Hall of Fame set. Ha Ha .....
posts.post_content: I am looking to buy a Joe Jackson card for my Hall of Fame set. Ha Ha ....Please private message me if you have anything for sale. [emoji12]

Hi Doug, just teasing... Are you predicting that next year will be the year Ol' Shoeless Joe gets in?
Get him cheap before prices rise due to his induction!
